clues.text:

COIL SIN

Unwanted facial feature:
CHUB ON DELI

Any temperamental diva:
PIN ON DRAMA

California city:
NO SERF

Doing things the easy but sloppy way:
INCORRECT STUNG

rounds.comments: (Alex: You have to correct the incorrect word in each clue.)
